website_summaries.verdict: This small island provides a comfortable float with a canopy and 2 cup holders.
pros: Quickly inflates with an air compressor
Canopy provides a good amount of shade while still allowing a breeze to pass through
cons: The canopy can be tricky to install and the float can sometimes lose air

customer_reviews.title: By FAR the BEST SPENT money of our entire trip!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS THE BEST SPENT MONEY OF THE ENTIRE VACATION!!!! Bought this to take on vacation to the Florida keys. Bought a little 10lb mushroom anchor to keep it in place and floated for 8 days in pure heaven!! Good quality materials. Very easy to put together. Very comfortable with PLENTY of room!!
customer_reviews.author: Bossy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!!!! Been using it at my pool and it's such a great quality inflatable. You can go 4 people on with your phones and clothes and you won't even get wet. I usually don't write reviews but this product deserves it :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy porch furniture
customer_reviews.text: This might be my favorite product that I have gotten on Amazon. I use it on my screened in porch as inflatable furniture and the canopy makes it feel so cozy. I wanted something comfy to be in when I drink my coffee in the morning or to enjoy the lights on my porch at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Great Sea Bed - got lots of envious looks
customer_reviews.text: Was a hit on our Maldives vacation. It stayed inflated for over 4 days. We deflated because we had to leave. We left it tied to the stairs night and day with no air refills. There were crabs on and around it but no punctures. It’s heavy and required it’s own suitcase to travel but it was well worth the effort. Cup holders were nice too. Please don’t forget to lay on a towel while floating because the float does get hot and the sweat pours off you. Great float and would work as an air mattress. It’s huge. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SP954

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Island!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo happy with our Island. Relaxing the entire day on it. Can't get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Our family loved this lounger
customer_reviews.text: Our family loved this lounger. We took it to South Lake Tahoe. It's easy to blow up with a car compressor. The canopy was awesome we loved having the shade (it does act like a sail), we created an anchor with a large rock and bungee cords. So fun it's great quality and best of all a manageable size for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The back rest is so comfortable! I'm a large person and had no problem ...
customer_reviews.text: We just blew it up and tried it out today. OMGosh, this is worth every penny. It is made from quality material. The back rest is so comfortable! I'm a large person and had no problem getting on it or off of it. After our exercise we got on the float with a book and just chilled. I think you could fit 4 average size adults on it. If I had any complaint at all, I think the cup holders should be on the arms in stead of in front of the arms. Having said that, I will leave it at 5 stars because everything else about it is PERFECT! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: John Armstrong  WLOX-TV 13

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't even give this a one star excepts it's so cool looking. Tried two and neither kept air. The first I at least used for a few days. The second wouldn't even hold air long enough to use. No kids were on these either. So disappointed but thanks to a great Amazom I was refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome float!
customer_reviews.text: So far we have only used this in our pool, but I think it is a great product especially for the cost. The plastic that it is made of seems tough and thick and the bottom is made of another material that seems particularly durable. The only part of the float that is difficult is the canopy. It is hard to get it together and difficult without two people to attach it to the float. The canopy also will not fold down, so if you don't want it up you will have to remove it. We have enjoyed it so far though and are looking forward to using it all summer.
customer_reviews.author: WenLee

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about this float is its size is incredibly large! You could fit a family of four on this thing. It also held air well and was comfortable to lounge in. What I dislike: I have gone through two of these. They dont seem to last but one summer here in Arizona. I guess I was expecting it to last forever. Wishful thinking, right? Also, the canopy can be confusing and just plain aggravating to put together. Regardless, I will be purchasing another for this summer. I have not been able to find a float I like better.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco & Courtney

customer_reviews.title: May or May not hold air. It's a chance.
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to review products but I will say a few things about this product. My wife bought one and I had to inflate it every day. This was concerning and I hated it. I felt it at the side of our pool overnight as I was too tired to bother . Our dog ate the plugs and I threw it in the trash. I bought another, inflate it and it is still inflated for two weeks. So, case in point...try your luck with it. If it deflates quickly, call the seller and return the product as I have noticed it Will hold air for weeks. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: #Otto

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this because it looked perfect online and would be ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this because it looked perfect online and would be an excellent addition to my pool. Got it, inflated it. Assembled the canopy (took about 30 min) and put it in the pool. As soon as the first person got on it immediately tore and was ruined. Very poor quality. Waste of half an hour putting it together and now I have to box it up and ship it back. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: AlexO

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for about a week, but everyone who has used it loves it so far. It was simple to inflate if you have an air compressor. It's very relaxing to lay on. Just keep in mind if you have any wind you will spin around because you essential have a sail, so you might not be able to hide in the "shade" part if you spin to face the sun.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: I only had this for 2 days and it wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I only had this for 2 days and it wouldn't hold air!! This was expensive I thought I was buying a quality product but they didn't offer any resolution
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Ricchiazzi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. My wife loves it. First time we used it the wind took my wife down the lake. I retrieved her in my kayak and towed her back. The canopy is a big sail that catches the wind. I use my 9 Pound boat anchor and clip the anchor line to the rope on the raft and she stays put now. Myself, my wife, and our son have all lounged on the raft and eaten lunch together. It is a good buy
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of time and money, arrives w holes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift. When we inflated it during pool season, about 3 months after purchase it wouldn't hold air for more than an hour. Contacted the seller and they refused to offer any support saying I only had 60 days, and that there's a patch kit inside I should use. Wasted multiple days filling this thing and then using leak finder to find out that the SEAM didn't hold properly( and there were multiple small tears as well). So I'm out $80, my girlfriend's present sucked, and I wasted way too much time trying to fix something that should work out of box. Intex has been absolutely no help. Would never do business with this company again .
customer_reviews.author: corey wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for use on still bodies of water
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent float! Sturdy and comfortable for 2 people, and quite the spectacle! The canopy is a bit annoying to put together, but not awful. However, beware that this not an ideal river vessel. I've floated down the river before in innertubes and had no issues whatsoever, so thought it would be fine. But the canopy acted like a sail and kept pushing us into the banks. Got quite a workout having to continuously paddle- not at all relaxing. (Paddles are a must!) That being said, the float did wonderfully at the lake, tied to a dock. Very comfy and relaxing in the right setting!
customer_reviews.author: Goodie12shoes

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am a float collector. I have one for every occasion. This one I wanted so I can float around, stay a little out of the sun, keep my book dry, and nap. It is perfect for all of that. My husband even joined me and we slept while floating to the current and sounds of the waterfall. Now if I could only figure out how to connect my table to the top . . . What I don't like is that I can inflate it on my own but can not put the top on. You need another person so this one is out of the question on which float to use for the day if I am alone.
customer_reviews.author: JHeck

customer_reviews.title: Damaged poles in package
customer_reviews.text: Ive just put this together. It wasn't too difficult. It is as advertised. I'm not sure if it will hold its air yet. However, when i opened the package containing the 3 sets of poles, one of the poles in B2 was cracked. I'm trying to contact the seller to get a replacement for this item. UPDATE: Contacted Intex customer support. They told me to cut out the air intake valves and the Intex logo from the float, send it to them and then they would replace it. NO WAY am I destroying this float. All I needed was one set of poles and they simply refused to send them. I WILL NEVER BUY FROM THIS COMPANY AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable is very big, which means it takes forever and a day to fill up completely. There is 2 separate parts to fill (the back rest and the bottom part). Another thing I noticed would have been nice to have is a bag... carrying the inflatable after taking the air out is very difficult and I just kept wishing that I had a bag to carry this huge thing in. Other than that it works very well especially the canopy... would buy again if needed. I also put my dogs on there and the material was very strong that their nails did not puncture it... so I am very happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Dedicated Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it, seems defective for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great float for a couple of hours. We thought it was just the stretching process, but 2 weeks in and every few hours we have to reinflate it. Quite an inconvenience. We checked it over as well and made sure the valve was secure, dipping it under the water to check for bubbles. Can't find the leak, but 2 weeks in...
customer_reviews.author: zsines

customer_reviews.title: No customer support
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue with this float is the customer service. As I was putting it together, one of the poles for the canopy broke. The rest of the float is fine and seems to be pretty good quality. My family enjoys it, but we would really like to get the pole replaced without having to return the whole thing. They point you to their webpage for replacement parts, but they are not available for this produce that I could find. No one responded to emails and there is no one available by phone.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J Molettiere

customer_reviews.title: Magical! My own floatie oaisis
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! And I love it. It easily fits three people but mostly I relax on it day/night with my dog, WFH, etc. I don’t even go IN the pool. It’s soothing to just sit on the water. It is a two person job to assemble and we used an air compressor to blow up. The canopy was missing an attachment and so has been wonky from the get go. The poles that keep that part in come out every now and again. Nonetheless I HIGHLY recommend. Especially with being home bound SIP this is another option for a retreat. (Or getaway from your famLOL)
customer_reviews.author: Heidi W.

customer_reviews.title: best float at two festivals/ sturdy and shade was CRITICAL
customer_reviews.text: baller status at two festivals now. easily held 6 people and served as a dock for other floaties. the shade is CRITICAL. only recommendation is to either have someone with strong legs kick you around by sitting off the front OR just get paddles. this thing can catch the wind and the current well if there is one and you'll either want an anchor or a way to stay in one place easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Increased our quality of life!!! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely over-delivered expectations! You can use this and stay 100% dry - we even take our laptops onto it. We bought in the spring and loved it so much that we floated on it with a blanket even on cool days. Now in the summer, we have happy hour every day “on the island.” We did have one small hole/leak on the backrest, and our parents (who we bought one for as a gift) got a hole In the same place so we think it’s a design flaw - but a little clear caulking did the trick. Even if I had to replace it each year, it would be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Janell1

customer_reviews.title: BEST pool accessory!
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST have if you have a pool! It is a hit with everyone in the family from the kids to myself and husband! You can lay and relax with or without canopy and read a book or the kids enjoy playing on it-definitely a win for us! It would work well even without a pool for a day at the beach! We typically do not use the canopy, but it does provide a ton of shade!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ this inflatable...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this...it’s a perfect fit for my swimming pool. It’s has a nice large bed, and I’m even able to keep two pillows and my current book in it without worrying about them getting wet. Best place to take a nap😜 If you have a small pool this might be a little to large. Otherwise, it’s perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: was super hot the day we used it though)
customer_reviews.text: This thing is massive! I bought it to float down a local river. Only took it out once this year, but it held air (for the most part, was super hot the day we used it though). At one point I had 3 adult males plus myself on it hanging out. One thing I did not like was that once water got on it, it was pretty hard to get it off. It was also windy that day so we left the canopy behind. The bottom is super thick material so I am confident it will last a while. Like I said, we took it down a river and I'm sure we floated over plenty of logs.
customer_reviews.author: K.C. Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Love my raft
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was hesitant to buy such a big float for my pool and it was expensive but I took the chance and am soooo glad I did this thing is great!!! It’s huge but still fits in my pool and is very sturdy I see the price has gone up quite a bit though since I bought it I was going to buy one for my mom but decided not to I paid $75 for it and now it is up to $90 only bad thing is u can’t put down the canopy u have to remove it if u don’t want it on but still a great raft!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it all around was a GREAT and FUN product
customer_reviews.text: I know there are some reviews where the product ripped right away or there was a hole it in HOWEVER, I used this for my girls weekend a few weeks ago, and we jumped(we got crazy), slide on the grass with it, and it all around was a GREAT and FUN product. Extremely perfect for pool/lake lounging if you don't want to get wet either. We fit 4-5 ladies comfortably. I bought the pump separately (Pump: Intex Quick-Fill AC ZAZ Electric Air Pump)and it blew up relatively fast and the material of the float is thick and reliable. I had a great experience with it. Didn't even need to blow it up more. We all loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Sav

customer_reviews.title: It's big enough for me and a love interest to sleep on comfortably
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest things ever invented. It's big enough for me and a love interest to sleep on comfortably, and comfortable enough to sit up against that back rest. It was my only piece of furniture for a week after moving out of my apartment. You can set it up at the park and have the canopy for shade, or float around in a lake. One thing is for sure- be prepared to get a lot of attention if you are chillin in this. People will come up and ask about it. My only complaint is the awkward placement of beverage holders.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Lund

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This float is just what I wanted to be able to read or just float in the pool without getting wet or tipping over. It easily fits me and my husband, who is 6’ 4”. Whoever wrote a review that they blew this thing up in 10 minutes is full of hot air. It took me and my husband over an hour taking turns. The canopy however was very easy to assemble, and there are directions in the side of the box for anyone who can’t figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Abtisam1

customer_reviews.title: Returning due to too many new negative reviews.
customer_reviews.text: After seeing so many negative reviews on this item not holding air I am going to return it. Spent $72 for a float that is now price gouged to over $170 on here. I never opened the package but from what I’m seeing via the internet it is not worth trying to assemble or try to blow up.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: HUGE and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for us. We Go to the river frequently and needed something that would allow us to hang out on the water for our extended amount of time. (Comfortably) This wasn't the lightest thing to haul around, but it was 100% worth it. Both my fiance and I count stretch out with room to spare-and we are not small people! =) No leaks, no issues. Just a whole lot of fun. We have used it 3 times and no problems yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase of the year. Took this baby to the lake and laid out all day on it. AMAZING! There was room for me someone else if needed. The shade was a pain to put on but once it was on it was worth it. Tied off a floating cooler to it so no need to have things up with me. You do sit up off the water pretty high so to get wet you have to bend over the side. It is very sturdy and you won't feel as though you will tip over. Its made of good material. Would totally purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Khomme

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control???
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida visiting the local sandbar is just what we do every weekend. Bought this float for the ladies to relax and stay cool in the shade. Yet, our float arrived missing one of the canopy connection points and the one it did have was flipped upside down. Guess someone fell asleep at intex and didn’t even perform a quality check on it. Was extremely disappointed after spending 20 inflating it and another 10 minutes assembling the “tent” style canopy that it couldn’t be used. I will say it is a great size. Very comfortable, but needed the canopy. I’ll give an update once it’s exchanged.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this and so do my Goldens!
customer_reviews.text: I searched forever to have something large enough that I could lounge with my 2 70lb golden retrievers. I just put a blanket on the float and this way their claws do not puncture it. There is so much room even with all of us on the raft. The canopy acts like a "SAIL" so we literally float around the pool. Dogs LOVE it! Enjoy! Highly recommend. I just ordered an outdoor 5 ft rug that will fit perfectly on top instead of the blankets/ towels which slip around. I will post a pic with the rug once it arrives! Looking forward to great floats with dogs, music, and a glass of wine on board!
customer_reviews.author: Becky G

customer_reviews.title: Canopy is nice touch -- but doesn't last long!
customer_reviews.text: It is great for too sunny days when a little shade is wanted --- BUT... the hoops that shape the canopy are poorly made and connected. They are made out if the same material has cheap fishing rods and snap very easily after being outdoors it the weather for a day or so. And where they connect to each other, they often disconnect if the float is shifted/twisted getting on or off it. After 2 days that nice rounded look is gone and it has all sorts of odd angles requiring you to take it apart and fix for fear of punctures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this float! It was a Christmas present to myself and I finaly got to use it when I opened the pool this weekend. I was able to get on it without getting wet and off with just getting my legs wet. (Kid was swimming but water was a little cool for my tastes). I even dozed off and took a little nap while floating on it. Sat out there and read a book for a good part of the afternoon on it.
customer_reviews.author: KC Red

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a LARGE float, THIS IS IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I've been a sun worshipper all my life and have bought MANY floats!! This one is big enough for the 2 of us to lay on. THE MORE DURABLE BOTTOM MAKES THE DIFFERENCE!! I love the fact you can remove the canopy! I looked for directions (in the box) to put the canopy poles in correctly. Couldn't find anything so I worked for an HR to get it right! Once I was through, I saw the directions ON THE BOX! had to redo, but that really is a pain for ONE person to do alone! I am 100% satisfied which is hard when purchasing big pool floats!!
customer_reviews.author: GKnee

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love this thing! It is really big, so watch out for that. We had a private plunge pool on our vacation and I floated around on this thing watching tv on my computer while baby napped. The cup holders need to be higher up closer to the pillow area, but I survived. I usually leave this stuff at the hote for the next person but I brought it home for our next vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime White

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite luxury both inside and outside the home!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this thing. It's in my living room. It's the best inflatable I have ever purchased. Very soft and comfortable. Have even fallen asleep on it while watching TV. Slept like a baby till morning. I love it so much, I bought two. One for outside to lay out in the sun with my wife in our yard and the other for the living room to just kick back in exquisite comfort while watching TV or playing video games. I only wish I had more money to buy about 20 of them.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Defective, One-time Use Item
customer_reviews.text: After spending the better part of a day inflating this item, it quickly began losing air and was 50% deflated by the following day. I re-inflated it and it once again lost half of its air within 24 hours. My husband and I checked the valves and ensured it wasn't user error. I emailed the company and they gave me the run-around. Too expensive of a product to have this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kara C.

customer_reviews.title: Huge and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I easily fit on here with my three kids! They’ve been pretty rough with it, jumping off the waterfall on to it, for example, and it is holding up perfectly. It stays outside in the pool in our blinding Phoenix sun and heat. We have only had to add a little more air once so far. Like someone else said, I do wish the cup holders were a little further up. Great addition to our pool collection!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline G.

customer_reviews.title: Raft doesn't stay well inflated and it was delivered with a broken part
customer_reviews.text: The size of the flotation is great for a couple people or 3 kids. The float was easy to assemble but one of the folding poles had a severed string so it could not be threaded through the canopy. The manufacturer's customer service portal didn't work so I couldn't submit a request for a replacement part. I spent over an hour on the phone on hold before hanging up. We've only had the float for a few days and I've had to re-inflate it every day before placing it back in the pool, so it doesn't hold air for that long, not like some of the other pool floats I have.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Pickavance

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited about this float, mostly because of the canopy. It was the only float I could find that had a full cover that you could get on without really getting wet - perfect for those too-cold pool days. Assembly wasn't difficult, but it wasn't easy. It's definitely easier with two people - took about 20 minutes. The only reason I'm giving this one star is because it had an existing hole. Couldn't keep air for more than 5 minutes. I'm hesitant to order another one, but did get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: This float is amazing! Yes it is big and yes I use it in my pool, but there's still plenty of room for other floats, so don't be scared off by the size. I love the fact that I can float around and not get wet if I don't want to, and so can my toddler! The canopy is perfect for shielding you from the sun when having a lazy day by the pool
customer_reviews.author: Christee Makimoto

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This float is big like other reviews mention. It does have a canopy with a vent that helps protect you from the sun but also allows air to flow through. I recommend if you live somewhere humid like Nebraska that you put a blanket or big beach blanket down on the float before making yourself at home. We floated a river for 2 1/2 hours with no issues. Really enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Kota Rose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was so awesome to take to the lake. Very comfortable and it fit our family of four (two adults and two kids under 3) just perfectly. We were asked several times where we got this while we were lounging. It’s tough to transport fully blown up because of its size but it’s has a nice reinforced bottom if you do end up moving it while it’s inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla E

customer_reviews.title: Great for the lake
customer_reviews.text: Love this float. We live on the lake and this float has been great. It can get really windy and the waves can get high. This has held up great. The only negative is the canopy does not stay on very well. Not much of an issue for us as we use it to layout on, but if you are wanting the shade the canopy fit might be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lounge-mazing
customer_reviews.text: Best thing that’s ever happened to my pool lounging life. I’d give it 5 stars except 1. The shade is cumbersome to attach and can’t really be lowered, it has to be taken off. 2. The cup holders are at your feet. This is maddening if you enjoy having a drink at your float. Otherwise wonderful. We enjoy reading in the pool and it holds myself and two daughters easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbee M. Noland

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This thing took FORever to blow up... even with an electric pump, but it was SO worth it! The sunshade was invaluable and both my husband and I (both large people) comfortably spent most of our days on this thing! The rope that runs along the edge came in super handy for tying off to the bank, or to other floats!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: One season in with this float, it seems very durable. Our dog loves to run across the deck and leap onto it, which she's done hundreds of times, so it seems plenty sturdy to handle dog claws. Plenty big enough for several people. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. T. Heath

customer_reviews.title: It’s huuuuuuge
customer_reviews.text: No directions came with mine. The poles have labels but no clue the significance. Seems to be put together just fine. It’s huge and takes a bit to pump up. The reason for 3 stars is it leaks air. Over the course of 5 days the bottom shows signs of air leaking. I checked for holes and can’t find any. I believe it’s the large air port that leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Rb

customer_reviews.title: This float would be perfect if it were not filled with holes in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This float would be perfect if it were not filled with holes in the base. It's horribly, really. We have been patching and patching it and it still loses air over the course of the day. I bought this for a Christmas present in December, but just opened it this month (June) because it's finally time to open the pool. Unfortunately, I cannot return it now. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: BumpasDog

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my sister. When she went to use it this spring, it broke within two weeks, and she was only on it 3 times. Since it was past the 45 day return window, and it was “used” I could not return or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was very sturdy. We used it to float down a river that is mostly slow and peaceful. There were two instances where the river got a little rough but the flotation device was able to handle it. It was nice to have the canopy to protect us from the sun. It was really labor intensive to blow it up with a hand pump. Luckily the place where we floated had an electrical pump for us to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shop

customer_reviews.title: Sooo much fun Intex!! Great job!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy @ $66 total!! We took it camping to Lake Greenwood in SC left it inflated all week but each night removed the shade. I would definitely plan on using an anchor if you need control of direction. Only improvement I'd recommend is allowing the shade to maintain its position & still collapse behind back rest & a storage bag would be great too!!
customer_reviews.author: HJK

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I bought it twice.
customer_reviews.text: I love this island so, so much! Fair warning though, after living outside in the Texas sun every day for four summer months, it couldn’t hold air. I don’t blame the product. Plastic degrades very fast in central Texas. I’m writing this review on the second one I purchased, because pool season isn’t over yet for us. Completely and totally worth every penny. When the sun kills this one, I’ll buy another. It is just that perfect.
customer_reviews.author: She Shop, She Shop

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Sturdy but
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice float. We purchased it for our pool. First storm we had with some minor wind, it did break the canopy, so for the price we were not happy about that. It is a bit expensive, but the float is thick and we like it. So aside from the canopy breaking, which is a bit of a bummer, we are enjoying the float. It is a pretty big float and fits two people very comfortably!
customer_reviews.author: SDVN12

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great size, but seam ripped.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great size. We have a 27X54 above ground pool and it fits perfectly in our pool with our other floats and swimmers. Very comfortable and nice looking. See pic. CON: Within in 3 days the seam split on the white part of float where you sit and therefore does not hold air. We had to patch ourselves which ruined the look and we're not confident it will hold long (hope it does because we really do like it). For the price, it should be sturdy enough to NOT have a leak. It is a great concept to sit and float on and it looks very nice, just wished it held air.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Already love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to just relax in my pool with my girlfriend and we both love it. Spent 2 hours just chatting and floating around slowly in a circle. I'm 5'10 and can completely spread out on it in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewsFoReal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing raft!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing raft! It looks so luxe and helped me relax without getting burned. I spent hours on this each day of my vacation. Word of warning: Make sure it is securely tied. The shade acts like a sail and it pulled free in the middle of the night. We found it in a bay the next day a mile away from our camp. Despite its adventure - it still worked great! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until...
customer_reviews.text: At first this was the coolest thing ever. That was short lived. The bottom does not hold air. I pumped it up and within an hour the bottom was nearly flat. Can’t pinpoint where the leak(s) are but I shouldn’t have to fix leaks on a new, just out of the box product. Intex will only refund if I bought it through their website and for only 15 days after delivery. Will be sending it back to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: NeilT

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Get it! This is our second one in 4 years living here in Florida it get used alot. This is the most amazing we call it " pool yatch" float we have ever purchased. It's big, confortable and sturdy. Our family, friends and dogs enjoy it. 👍 Thank you for such and amazing product 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was a day late. Understandable, considering it was a holiday weekend. 10 minutes before we leave on Sunday for the lake it showed up! Everyone had a blast. It was sturdy and held up to sharp lake obstacles. (Lake people know:) Was easy to assemble and break down. On a sad note- It will NEVER fit back in the box. Never
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great spacious float!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great float for hanging out. Used it in Croatia at yacht week, can easily fit 4 grown adults no problem. and a decent size. atleast 2 of us were over 230 lbs. If using the canopy...a.) get an anchor cause the wind will catch it and blow you away and b.) start to assemble it a little ahead of time cause it may take some time to put together. Other than that. Inflation with an air pump no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I can be in the pool with my grandkids but relax in a comfortable lounge at the same time. I needed the shade to protect my skin and stay out of the heat. It's perfect for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Connie C. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: This item is horrible because it constantly loses air within 2 hours. I attempted to contact Amazon customer service and you receive a message that phone service is limited and to file a complaint via the Internet. Unfortunately there is no way to do that for this item purchased in late April 2020. All I desire is a replacement that does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: hjkass

customer_reviews.title: Best pool float!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best float I've ever purchased! It is like a floating couch and bed in one. The canopy is the feature that was the selling point for me. I want to be in the pool without getting more UV rays. I have also clothspinned a sheet over the opening to block all of the sun. It has been blown up for days and hasn't lost any air. Fantastic product. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, high quality raft. Easily holds 2 adults + a small child. Easy to assemble. Extremely large, but that's what makes it so much fun! Can use in swimming pool OR on grass area. Canopy keeps wind off of you and also provides shade. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: not worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this float 2 times. First time after a month of use ( couple times a week) floatie "blew" one of the seams out ( Not repairable) ok lets try again, had 2nd one for 2 weeks and all of a sudden we have slow leak some where ...can not find so not happy especially for $80
customer_reviews.author: Danene Irvin

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it is the best investment I made ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it is the best investment I made for myself in along time. I am 62 years and have Parkinsons, so therefore my stretching abilities dont always work, but once I found a way to get in I can do it most of the time. My only drawback is that the back is very high, the sides are lower so therefore much easier to rest your head.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Decamp

customer_reviews.title: Deflated the first day.
customer_reviews.text: This float is thick & large. 3 adults can fit on it. It deflated after one day. We had to blow it up every time we used it. Plus it was a little too big. We have a big pool & it was too big for the pool & too big to store outside the pool. Amazon was very good about returning it, but we decided to keep it for the kids to play on even if it was deflated most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice floatie
customer_reviews.text: This floatie is awesome. Kept the sun off of us and allowed up to three people to lounge on it. We used a pump to blow it up which is pretty necessary. It's a bit heavy and awkward to carry down to the water but with more than two people it's easy. The canopy part is sort of delicate and broke a bit when it got windy but it's still functional and the wonderful was pretty strong so that may not happen often.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M

customer_reviews.title: Made very well!
customer_reviews.text: We have ours tied up to the pool so it doesn’t blow away in high winds. We have had it for a month now and the daily wind slams it against the rough flagstone around our pool. It hasn’t leaked one bit of air and not one hole or scratch yet. I’m shocked. We love it! Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: PleasantlyPixie

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand where the hole is
customer_reviews.text: I originally loved this float. Unfortunately it had a hole in it that I discovered overtime. It never crossed my mind to return it. I purchased a new one, and this one has a hole in the top half somewhere that I cannot seem to find. It will not stay inflated, and it is driving me nuts. I am not sure if this happens during shipping, but I did not even get to put the top half on the float yet since I cannot get the top half to stay inflated. I am going to purchase one more time. Hopefully I can write a better review.
customer_reviews.author: giana iaconetti

customer_reviews.title: Must have pool accessory!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this raft, this is our second or third year to order it. The size is perfect for lounging/floating without getting wet (our small dog even loves to lay on it with us). This raft more than doubles our use of the pool, allowing us to take a drink and float almost all year round and for short or long periods of time. One of my all-time favorite purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaphive

customer_reviews.title: Magical princess float
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite item ever. It feels quality. Materials are sturdy. The main air hole is wide so get a mattress pump to blow it up.
customer_reviews.author: Sari

customer_reviews.title: Love it..
customer_reviews.text: Okay reason I didn't give it 5 stars on all, the only instructions it provided was showing how to put air in it. None on how to tie the rope or how to put the poles. Pictures on the box didn't really help. So far so good we will see how long it will last. Other than that we love it..
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Pizzolato

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Floating With a Friend or Lover!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this island! It's great for floating around my giant swimming pool. It might not be the best if you have a tiny kidney shaped pool. My only complaint is that it's white and it will get dirty. I wonder if it would get too hot if it were a darker color though?
customer_reviews.author: Katie Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Six weeks old. Will not hold air. One pole snapped during assembly. I wrote to seller and they basically asked for a bunch of pictures, part number, invoice, blah blah blah. Too much work to just get a repair. Won't but from them again.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: My Day Bed in my own Home! Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for the summer. East valve to pump air if you have a manual or electric pump. Easy to release wait with the Boston valve. Looks amazing in the water and hold quite a lot of people. The canopy does not fully swing back but keeps some shade. A really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Best float ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect, I really wanted a float that had both cup holders and some shade from the sun. My pool gets direct sunlight all day, and we love to be in the pool but need some shade occasionally. This float can fit 3 adults really! much bigger in person. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: rere

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with any directions on how to put the ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with any directions on how to put the canopy on and it was a huge hassle to try to guess how to run the canopy supports through. At one point the fabric was closed off/sewed so the supports couldn't even slide through. We got it halfway together and realized that the canopy does not stay on well at all. So we use it without the canopy but it's definitely not worth the price we paid at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Helmer

customer_reviews.title: Came Defective
customer_reviews.text: This seems great, but it came with a hole, and leaked immediately. I cannot contact the seller directly for some reason. They will replace it but it is huge and wont fit back in the box so I am stuck with the defective one and will be charged for a replacement. Not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Durden

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Float
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year but never assembled it because I was intimidated. Turns out I was worried for no reason. The directions for the canopy are printed on the box so don’t go frantically looking for them like I did. Once I found them assembly was a breeze. Very happy!! I could have sworn I spent $200+ on this and was amazed to see the actual price!
customer_reviews.author: NicGable

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Directions would be Great
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this in theory. I even love it even though I have to inflate it each time I want to use it because there is a slow leak who knows where ... but I love it. I wish there were directions for assembly because I'm sure I didn't insert the rods correctly for the canopy. Would I buy it again? Absolutely if I could get it for the same ~ $80 for which I purchased it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: All aro
customer_reviews.text: A great product for the money. I have enjoyed my island. You obviously need a mechanical blower to fill this badboy. I like the rope to tie off my inflatable drink island or to anchor myself in the shade. Its the best pool or beach toy ive bought in my 42 years of the salt life. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Very big and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and she loves it. It is super sturdy and you do not get wet at all laying on it. Sits high off the water surface. It’s very big and provides a lot of shade. You can take the canopy off easily but we haven’t felt the need to yet.
customer_reviews.author: MvPJ10

customer_reviews.title: It's a cool float 😎👌
customer_reviews.text: Just received today, I haven't taken it out the box to assemble but it came nice and we'll packaged. I'm excited to use it in the pool later this month. Hopefully everything is fine but I'll try to come back and give a update after it's used.
customer_reviews.author: Nequia Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great. Just great.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits 2 people laying down. 4-5 sitting. A bit tough jumping on from the water without doing the walrus pose though. Also I got a hole in mine in the bottom so I'm not too sure about the durability of the bottom. Try not to use it somewhere with a lot of debris underwater like a river with a small current.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is easily big enough to fit 2 adult comfortably. The material seems quite sturdy and it was fairly easy to put the canopy on. The only thing I wish is that the canopy was able to be pulled back rather than having to take it completely off each time you want to have more sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... but canopy is extremely difficult to install and even worse to disassemble
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars but canopy is extremely difficult to install and even worse to disassemble. Good quality though
customer_reviews.author: Joost Lanser

customer_reviews.title: BEST FLOAT EVER
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Its HUGE!!!!!!!! You could probably fit 4 adults on it. One of my favorite parts about is that you dont get wet when you hop on it in the pool... its a good 6 inches in height! Its so comfortable and I love the adjustable canopy. I got this for my mom for mothers day and she absolutly loves it.. as do I :) Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: AK2208

customer_reviews.title: Broke 2nd time we used it in pool
customer_reviews.text: This broke the 2nd time we used it. And it was cared for. Very, very Disappointed! We bought it to celebrate a 16th quarantine birthday. I was going to replace it but it is now $100 instead of $72. Intel is usually a good, solid brand. It would be appreciated if it could be replaced. There must have been a defect in this one. As I read the reviews and others were so pleased with their purchase AND they used it with an overload and in a lake - the wild outdoors. 😞 We stayed under the weight and set it in a pool. So strange.
customer_reviews.author: Gwpace

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Great product for adults at the pool. Every time I get on it I'm asleep in minutes. The upright back is little straight up to be used as a pillow so we added a couple of inflatable pillows. This thing is big so it is difficult to hide from the grand kids.
customer_reviews.author: M2 Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! It is huge!!! And I needed big. Me and 2 other medium sized adults can fit with a small cooler. My husband 180lbs, 2 kids 100 & 40 lbs and myself 230 lbs can fit. Just make sure it is blown up all the way or you will have tilting issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Hole in it and no patches provided.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the canopy island. It looks great but has a hole in it. Not only that there are no patches provided to fix such the issue which I find Says a lot about how a company is run and corners they cut. It’s beyond disappointing and a huge waste of time to now have to pack this up and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oasis in the pool 🌴
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable island is made with thick material. We are happy with the comfort and quality. The canopy keeps us pretty well covered, unless the sun is at a certain height and we are facing that direction. We haven't found this to be a big problem, we simply paddle ourselves around. Love the size, my husband and I fit very comfortably on this, with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Mommabola

product_meta.title: Intex Canopy Island Inflatable Lounge, 78" X 59"
product_meta.description: Size:78" X 59"Whether socializing with friends or laying out at the pool, the Intex Canopy Island is perfect for relaxing in luxury while enjoying the water. The island has a detachable fabric sun shade that provides just the right amount of shade from the heat on hot summer days allowing you to unwind in comfort. Two air chambers are added for extra safety and two built-in cup holders are included for you to keep a beverage nearby. Rest with the comfortable back rest, relax and savor the experience! Approximate deflated size: 781/2" x 59". Includes: Detachable fabric sun shade. Comfortable back rest. Two air chambers. 2 built-in cup holders. Repair patch.
feature_bullets: Whether socializing with friends or laying out at the pool,
Detachable fabric sun shade provides just the right amount of shade from the heat on hot summer days allowing you to unwind in comfort
Two air chambers are added for extra safety and two built-in cup holders are included for you to keep a beverage nearby
Rest with the comfortable back rest, relax and savor the experience! Approximate deflated size: 781/2" x 59"
Includes: Detachable fabric sun shade; Comfortable back rest; Two air chambers; 2 built-in cup holders; Repair patch
It is recommended to leave the item inflated for the initial stretch period.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,786 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
